channel.title: me on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in me on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: about me
item.description: current assistant professor of statistics Econometric Institute, Erasmus School of Economics, Erasmus University Rotterdam past research fellow of statistics Department of Law and Economics, UnitelmaSapienza University of Rome education phd in methodological statistics at La Sapienza University of Rome (2020) msc in statistics and decision sciences at La Sapienza University of Rome (2016) bsc in statistics at La Sapienza University of Rome (2013) grants research grant for junior researcher “Avvio alla ricerca” (2017) award in Stats under the Stars (an Italian Statistical Society competition): best report (2017) academic services national coordinator of young SIS (2022) programme committee member of “SIS 2022: the 51st Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society” (2022) programme committee member of the conference “IES 2022: Innovation and Society 5.
